titles.title: Community Bank and Automotive Industry Recapitalization Act of 2011
Community Bank and Automotive Industry Recapitalization Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage investment in certain industries by providing an exclusion from tax on certain gains.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Community Bank and Automotive Industry Recapitalization Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income gain from the sale of qualified investment property acquired within 18 months after the enactment of this Act and held for more than five years. Defines "qualified investment property" as original issue stock in a community bank with less than $10 billion in assets or an automotive company.
